# Links to Presentations

```{r}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
gert::git_ls() |>
  dplyr::select(path) |>
  dplyr::arrange(desc(path)) |>
  dplyr::filter(stringr::str_detect(path, "\\.html")) |>
  dplyr::filter(!stringr::str_detect(path, "(script)|(\\_files)|(title-slide)")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    group = stringr::str_extract(path, "^\\d{4}\\-\\d{2}[^\\-/]*"),
    group = dplyr::if_else(nchar(group) < 10, stringr::str_extract(path, "^\\d{4}\\-\\d{2}[^/]*"), group),
    group = stringr::str_replace_all(group, "-(?!\\d)", " "),
    group = stringr::str_squish(group),
    link = paste0("https://steffilazerte.ca/Presentations/", path),
    file = fs::path_file(path),
    file = paste0("[", file, "](", link, ")")) |>
  dplyr::summarize(
    text = paste0(" - ", group[1], "\n",
                  paste0(paste0("    - ", file), collapse = "\n"), "\n"), 
    .by = "group") |>
  dplyr::pull(text) |>
  cat()
```
